control.description-key: A customizable tooltip component for Power Apps forms with advanced positioning and column layout support

property.name: tooltipContent
property.description-key: Content to display in the tooltip (can be bound to any text field)

property.name: fieldLogicalName
property.description-key: The logical name of the field to attach tooltip to (REQUIRED for proper positioning)

property.name: isHidden
property.description-key: Hide the tooltip component completely

property.name: iconType
property.description-key: Type of icon to display

property.name: customIcon
property.description-key: Custom icon character or emoji (overrides Icon Type)

property.name: iconColor
property.description-key: Icon text color (hex code like #0078d4)

property.name: iconBackgroundColor
property.description-key: Icon background color (hex code)

property.name: iconBorderColor
property.description-key: Icon border color (hex code)

property.name: iconSize
property.description-key: Size of the icon in pixels

property.name: iconStyle
property.description-key: Visual style of the icon container

property.name: layoutMode
property.description-key: How to position the tooltip in relation to form layout

property.name: columnWidth
property.description-key: Width of the tooltip column when in separate or shared column mode

property.name: enableColumnWidthAdjustment
property.description-key: Automatically adjust the associated field column width to accommodate tooltip column

property.name: columnSpacing
property.description-key: Space between tooltip and field columns

property.name: columnAlignment
property.description-key: Vertical alignment within the column

property.name: responsiveBreakpoint
property.description-key: Screen width below which columns collapse to inline mode

property.name: iconAlignment
property.description-key: Vertical alignment of the icon relative to field content

property.name: iconHorizontalPosition
property.description-key: Horizontal positioning of the icon

property.name: positionStrategy
property.description-key: Strategy for positioning the component inline with fields

property.name: maxFieldWidth
property.description-key: Maximum width of the associated field when positioned inline

property.name: triggerType
property.description-key: How to show the tooltip

property.name: tooltipPlacement
property.description-key: Where to position the tooltip relative to icon

property.name: showDelay
property.description-key: Delay before showing tooltip in milliseconds

property.name: hideDelay
property.description-key: Delay before hiding tooltip in milliseconds

property.name: autoHideDelay
property.description-key: Auto hide tooltip after this time (0 = never auto hide)

property.name: tooltipBackgroundColor
property.description-key: Background color of tooltip (hex code)

property.name: tooltipTextColor
property.description-key: Text color of tooltip (hex code)

property.name: tooltipBorderColor
property.description-key: Border color of tooltip (hex code)

property.name: maxWidth
property.description-key: Maximum width of tooltip in pixels

property.name: minWidth
property.description-key: Minimum width of tooltip in pixels

property.name: tooltipBorderRadius
property.description-key: Border radius of tooltip corners

property.name: tooltipFontSize
property.description-key: Font size of tooltip text

property.name: allowHtml
property.description-key: Allow HTML formatting in tooltip content

property.name: preserveLineBreaks
property.description-key: Convert line breaks to HTML line breaks

property.name: wordWrap
property.description-key: Enable word wrapping in tooltip content

property.name: redirectUrl
property.description-key: URL to navigate to when icon is clicked (optional)

property.name: openInNewTab
property.description-key: Open redirect URL in new browser tab

property.name: enableAnimation
property.description-key: Enable smooth animations for tooltip show/hide

property.name: animationDuration
property.description-key: Duration of show/hide animations

property.name: enableShadow
property.description-key: Enable drop shadow for tooltip

property.name: enableArrow
property.description-key: Show arrow pointing to icon

property.name: ariaLabel
property.description-key: Accessibility label for screen readers

property.name: enableKeyboardNavigation
property.description-key: Enable keyboard accessibility (Tab, Enter, Escape)

property.name: focusOnShow
property.description-key: Focus tooltip when shown for screen readers

property.name: zIndex
property.description-key: CSS z-index for tooltip layering

property.name: enableBackdropFilter
property.description-key: Enable backdrop blur effect

property.name: debugMode
property.description-key: Enable debug logging and visual indicators

property.name: showBoundingBoxes
property.description-key: Show visual debug boxes (debug mode only)

property.name: position
property.description-key: Legacy positioning option - use Layout Mode instead
